VizBlocks

VizBlocks

VizBlocks is a tangible, modular and hackable toolkit for exploring data visualisation and the internet of things.

scroll to see more

What is VizBlocks?

Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit. Mauris commodo interdum est eu mollis. Sed imperdiet, libero a rhoncus euismod, nisl eros dictum est, sed. Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit. Mauris commodo interdum est eu mollis. Sed imperdiet, libero a rhoncus euismod, nisl eros dictum est, sed.

VizBlocks is a project by The Centre for Design Informatics at The University of Edinburgh, in partnership with Partner 1, Partner 2 and Partner 3.

The project was funded by Edinburgh Futures Institute, Funder 2 and Funder 3.
